meanings.sent1: She tackled the challenge toughly, showing great strength.
meanings.sent2: He walked toughly through the rough terrain without complaining.
meanings.sent3: The little ant tried to lift the heavy leaf toughly, but it was too big for her.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood toughly against the strong winds, refusing to bend.
meanings.sent5: The knight fought toughly against the dragon, never giving up.
